model.character
Class AbstractCharacter

java.lang.Object
  model.CollidableObject
      model.Entity
          model.character.AbstractCharacter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IMessageSender
Direct Known Subclasses:
Enemy, Player
public abstract class AbstractCharacter
extends Entity

Character. A character in the game. Could be a player, enemy, etc.

Author:
Johan

takeDamage

public void takeDamage(int dmg)
Call this method to hurt the character with a certain amount of damage.

If the character's health points goes below 0, destroy() will be called and the entity is killed.

Sends a WAS_DAMAGED event with the value this

.

Parameters:
dmg - The damage

getHealth

public int getHealth()
Get the character's current health

Returns:
The health

addHealth

public void addHealth(int amount)
Add health.

Will never make the health higher than the original max health. If the health and the amount specified are together higher than the max health, the new health will be the max health.

Parameters:
amount - The amount

update

public void update(double dt)
Update this character, which could react and do stuff based on the delta time passed.

Parameters:
dt - The delta time

setHealth

public void setHealth(int amount)
Set the health. Bypasses the maximum health, i.e. you're able to set the health higher than the maximum health.

Parameters:
amount - The new health

getMaxHealth

public int getMaxHealth()
Get the maximum, or starting, health for this character as it was set on init.

Returns:
The starting health

Tell the character to attack a target (another Character)

Sends a DID_ATTACK event with the value this

target - The target to attack
